metadata.job: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl Ingredients: • 1 cup cottage cheese • 1/4 cup diced cucumber • 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 1/4 cup diced bell pepper • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper. Almond Butter and Apple Slices Ingredients: • 1 apple, sliced • 2 tablespoons almond butter Instructions: • Spread almond butter on each apple slice.

Briam • Ingredients: o 2 potatoes o 2 zucchinis o 2 eggplants o 2 tomatoes o 1 small onion o 4 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon oregano o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper • Instructions: o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer for 20 minutes.

Kartoffelsalat (Potato Salad) • Ingredients: o 4 potatoes o 1 small onion o 1/4 cup bacon o 1/4 cup vinegar o 1/4 cup chicken broth o 1 tablespoon mustard o 1 teaspoon sugar o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper o Serve warm.
• In the same skillet, sauté minced garlic until fragrant. • In a bowl, whisk eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, and heavy cream (if using).

Farofa • Ingredients: o 2 cups cassava flour o 1/4 cup butter o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup bacon o 1/4 cup parsley o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Sauté diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic in butter until crispy. Fattoush • Ingredients: o 2 pita breads o 4 tomatoes o 1 cucumber o 1 small red onion o 1/4 cup parsley o 1/4 cup mint o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon sumac o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Toast pita breads until crispy, then break into pieces.
